oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Neutral electron trap generation under irradiation in reoxidized nitrided gate dielectrics
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAMGOPAL RAO, V
SHARMA, DK
VASI, J
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mos capacitors
dielectric thin films
electron traps
nitridation
oxidation
radiation effects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this study we report for the first time results on neutral electron trap generation in reoxidised nitrided oxide dielectrics under various radiation doses and bias conditions and compare the results with the conventional oxides. We see very little electron trap creation in RNO dielectrics for radiation doses up to 5 Mrad (Si) and for bias fields up to Â±2.5 MV/cm. We explain our results in RNO and oxide dielectrics using a three step defect creation model.
